name: Add Sep with read only permissions
description:
In order to limit who can give an enrollment a Sep,
  only hbx admins with read and write permissions can have the
  add SEP menu item enabled from the family index page.

steps.name: a Hbx admin with read only permissions exists
Hbx Admin logs on to the Hbx Portal
Hbx Admin click Families link
the Hbx Admin clicks on the Action button

elements.name: Click on Add Sep

steps.name: the Add SEP option should be disabled
a Hbx admin with read only permissions exists
Hbx Admin logs on to the Hbx Portal
Hbx Admin click Families link
the Hbx Admin clicks on the Action button

elements.name: Click on Cancel Enrollment

steps.name: the Cancel Enrollment option should be disabled
a Hbx admin with read only permissions exists
Hbx Admin logs on to the Hbx Portal
Hbx Admin click Families link
the Hbx Admin clicks on the Action button

elements.name: Click on Terminate Enrollment

steps.name: the Terminate Enrollment option should be disabled

name: Hbx Admin creates a New Consumer Application for ivl users

elements.name: Hbx Admin navigates into the new consumer application with paper application option and goes forward till DOCUMENT UPLOAD page

steps.name: Hbx Admin exists
Hbx Admin logs on to the Hbx Portal
admin has navigated into the NEW CONSUMER APPLICATION
the Admin is on the Personal Info page for the family
the Admin clicks the Application Type drop down
the Admin selects the Paper application option
all other mandatory fields on the page have been populated
Admin clicks CONTINUE button
the Admin will be navigated to the DOCUMENT UPLOAD page

elements.name: Hbx Admin uploads and verifies application document

steps.name: Hbx Admin is on ridp document upload page
hbx admin uploads application document and verifies application
Hbx Admin logs out
Individual visits the Insured portal outside of open enrollment
Individual creates a new HBX account
I should see a successful sign up message
user should see your information page
user registers as an individual
user clicks on continue button
user should see heading labeled personal information
Individual should click on Individual market for plan shopping
the Individual selects “I Disagree”
the Individual clicks CONTINUE
Individual should land on Documents upload page
Individual logs out
an HBX admin exists
clicks on Individual in Families tab
Admin should land on ridp document upload page

name: If HBX Admin selects CURAM or Mobile application types, Experian Auth and Consent Page and Document Upload pages are bypassed

elements.name: If Applicant has e_case_id then EA will automatically populate the Application Type as CURAM

steps.name: Hbx Admin exists
Hbx Admin logs on to the Hbx Portal
admin has navigated into the NEW CONSUMER APPLICATION
the user has a family with e_case_id and visit personal information edit page
EA will automatically populate the Application Type as CURAM

elements.name: If Applicant dont have e_case_id then EA will automatically populate all Application Types.

steps.name: Hbx Admin exists
Hbx Admin logs on to the Hbx Portal
admin has navigated into the NEW CONSUMER APPLICATION
the applicant with no e_case_id and visit personal information edit page
the Admin is on the Personal Info page for the family
EA will display all the Application Types

elements.name: If the user selects the CURAM or Mobile application option then the user should navigate to the HOUSEHOLD INFO page.

steps.name: Hbx Admin exists
Hbx Admin logs on to the Hbx Portal
admin has navigated into the NEW CONSUMER APPLICATION
the applicant with no e_case_id and visit personal information edit page
the Admin is on the Personal Info page for the family
the Admin clicks the Application Type drop down
the Admin selects the Curam application option
all other mandatory fields on the page have been populated
Admin clicks CONTINUE button
the Admin should navigate to Household Info Page

elements.name: If the user selects the CURAM or Mobile application option then the user should navigate to the HOUSEHOLD INFO page.

steps.name: Hbx Admin exists
Hbx Admin logs on to the Hbx Portal
admin has navigated into the NEW CONSUMER APPLICATION
the applicant with no e_case_id and visit personal information edit page
the Admin is on the Personal Info page for the family
the Admin clicks the Application Type drop down
the Admin selects the Mobile application option
all other mandatory fields on the page have been populated
Admin clicks CONTINUE button
the Admin should navigate to Household Info Page

name: Update APTC and CSR
description:
In order to update APTC and CSR
    User should have the role of an admin

elements.name: Admin views the Edit APTC / CSR grid for an individual without an assistance recieving (with APTC) enrollment

steps.name: Hbx Admin exists
Hbx Admin logs on to the Hbx Portal
Hbx Admin click Families link
Hbx Admin should see the list of primary applicants and an Action button
Hbx Admin clicks Action button
Hbx Admin should see an Edit APTC / CSR link

there is an employer ABC Widgets

the user is on the Employer Index of the Admin Dashboard
the user enters fein of employer ABC Widgets in search bar
the user will see ABC Widgets Employer
the user will not see XYZ Widgets Employer

name: Add searchbox on broker agencies
description: In order for the Hbx admin to search for broker agencies through searchbox

elements.name: Search for a broker agency

steps.name: there is a Broker Agency exists for District Brokers Inc
the broker Max Planck is primary broker for District Brokers Inc
Hbx Admin exists
Hbx Admin logs on to the Hbx Portal
Hbx Admin is on Broker Index of the Admin Dashboard
Hbx Admin is on Broker Index and clicks Broker Agencies
Hbx Admin should see search box
he enters an broker agency name and clicks on the search button
he should see the one result with the agency name

name: Update User Credentials
description:
In order to update DOB and SSN
  User should have the role of an admin

elements.name: Admin enters valid credentials

steps.name: Hbx Admin Tier 3 exists
Hbx Admin Tier 3 logs on to the Hbx Portal
Hbx Admin Tier 3 sees User Accounts link
Hbx Admin Tier 3 clicks on User Accounts link
Hbx Admin Tier 3 should see the list of primary applicants and an Action button
Hbx Admin Tier 3 clicks on the Action button
Hbx Admin Tier 3 should see an edit user link
Hbx Admin Tier 3 clicks on edit user link
Hbx Admin Tier 3 enters an valid credentials and clicks on submit
Hbx Admin Tier 3 should see updated successfully message

elements.name: Admin enters invalid credentials

steps.name: Hbx Admin Tier 3 exists
Hbx Admin Tier 3 logs on to the Hbx Portal
Hbx Admin Tier 3 sees User Accounts link
Hbx Admin Tier 3 clicks on User Accounts link
Hbx Admin Tier 3 should see the list of primary applicants and an Action button
Hbx Admin Tier 3 clicks on the Action button
Hbx Admin Tier 3 should see an edit user link
Hbx Admin Tier 3 clicks on edit user link
Hbx Admin Tier 3 enters an invalid credentials and clicks on submit
Hbx Admin Tier 3 should see error message

elements.name: Search for Employer by Locked filter

comments.value: # @flaky
# Scenario: Search for Employer by Role filter
#   Given user visits the Hbx Portal
#   And Hbx Admin click on User Accounts
#   Then Hbx Admin should see text Account Updates
#   Then Hbx Admin should see columns related to user account
#   Then Hbx Admin should see buttons to filter
#   When I click Employee button
#   Then I should only see user with employee role
#   When I click Employer button
#   # failing on this step
#   Then I should only see user with employer staff role <---- causing error
#   When I click Broker button
#   Then I should only see user with broker role
#   When I click All button
#   Then I should see users with any role

steps.name: user with Employee Role role is locked
user with Broker role is unlocked
user visits the Hbx Portal
Hbx Admin click on User Accounts
I click Employee and Locked button
I should only see user with employee role
